dict.acceptation: 不论以何种方式，不论以何种方法；无论如何，至少；但是；不顾；

sent.orig: Anyway I'm not going to dwell on it. Not till I get there anyway.
sent.trans: 还好，我不是道森城的居民，至少在我到达那里之前是这么一回事。

sent.orig: David: That's true. And dinners are different, anyway.
sent.trans: 那倒是真的。不管怎么样，晚餐就不同。

sent.orig: "Oh, we've never been serious about it-not enough to have a tiff, anyway!"
sent.trans: “本来没有什么，谈不到发生变化。”

sent.orig: He said he didn't want the job anyway, but that's just sour grapes.
sent.trans: 他说他其实不想干这份工作，这只不过是吃不到葡萄说葡萄酸而已。

sent.orig: Allan: But I love all festivals, people usually feel happy during festivals anyway.
sent.trans: 但是我喜欢所有节日，无论怎么，人们在节日里总是感到快乐的。
